file_content.text: With the spy droids eliminated, our plans are back on schedule.
Lieutenant Durand? I found Sergeant Peden's datapad and destroyed the Republic spy droids.
Oh. Thank you very much, my lord.
I see. Well, your assistance is greatly appreciated, agent.
Then... I see. Thank you for your assistance.
Those droids were a tremendous risk to our operational security. Now that they're out of the picture, we can proceed with our work here.
Shame to have lost Peden over a pack of droids, though--he had a good head on his shoulders. Would've been good to have him moving forward.
There is no shame in giving one's life for the Emperor's goals.
He died to serve the Empire.
Quite true, my lord. We can only hope to be so fortunate as Peden.
The galaxy is chaos. Don't resent it--embrace it.
That's the way of things.
Need more muscle?
We have much to do, but nothing beginning at the moment. Your enthusiasm is appreciated, however.
Peden gave his life for the mission. No shame in that.
He died in the line of duty.
Quite right. His family should be proud.
Your soldier failed in his task and died as a result. He was unworthy.
Better to be rid of him.
He paid for failing his task.
Uh... yes, my lord. As you say.
I'll take my pay now.
Ah. Yes. You'll be compensated in full.
Do you need more assistance?
No, thank you, agent. Our next operations are only beginning--I cannot ask you to wait around until the field work begins.
Are you still talking?
My apologies--I didn't intend to hold you up with my rambling.
If you'll excuse me, I'll leave you to go on about your own business. My thanks again for your assistance in this matter.
Glory to the Emperor!
